entry.title: New release for Mobilizon: 5.0.1
entry.content:
This release has been made by Kaihuri

This project is funded through NGI Zero Core, a fund established by NLnet with financial support from the European Commission's Next Generation Internet program. Learn more at the NLnet project page.

Highlights

  • custom logo, favicon and default event card
  • ability to separate short event and long lasting events, called activities
  • better use of location
  • UI cleaning

Detailed changelog

Features

  • frontend: change horizontal scroll to grid view. closes #1456 (b48ab820)
  • frontend: remove popular groups and online events from homepage. closes #1527 (18c78b81)
  • frontend: location enhancement on homepage, closes #1475 (79bd6a5d)
  • frontend: no activities on homepage, closes [#1469] (79bd6a5d)
  • frontend: Remove promoted categories if there is only one category (c36bd4c0)
  • backend: add hat geocoder as a config (d5adda00)
  • frontend: remove distractions (bec675867)
  • service: add hat geocoder, closes [#1414] (3cbf5e5da)
  • front: default sort search results by date (117d7f419)
  • frontend: neutral colors (6e141decf)
  • frontend: show event start time and weekday (a004e10e8)
  • frontend: instance personnalization: logo, favicon, defautl card, title, closes [#1397] (a815a0724)
  • frontend: calendar view, closes [#1334] (e168fb307)
  • api: allow url link to image in event creation api, closes [#1395] (f582adbb8)
  • frontend: home page, show upcoming events, closes [#1400] (2d2abfe93)
  • frontend: remove distractive contents, closes [#1402] (ea3fb1172)
  • event: option to hide number of participants, closes [#1403] (78b73b7e0)
  • events: open to handle long events as activities, closes [#1394] (72d78ed8f)
  • frontend: remove related events from event query (2ed1f9d58)
  • frontend: add "hide number of participants" option (c4805e7d1)

Bugfixes

  • front: preserve tags when modifiying post or event (df6ffee7)
  • frontend: Resolve "Updating an event or a groupe is emptying some fields" (93562c6b)
  • frontend: Fix border width of btn-outlined-warning (be14c18d)
  • frontend: Use the correct locale to create the event date and time icons (462ed5b3)
  • frontend: @update:modelValue works again with oruga-ui 0.8.12 (023f1593)
  • backend: Use RemoteMediaDownloaderClient, not Tesla directly to use global ssl options (6d7688e4)
  • frontend: Calendar beta indication: reduce font size to make in fit on mobile (c6683595)
  • frontend: my events page, handle start date correctly (e41ecd37)
  • frontend: tags are correctly restored on the taginput (3657636e)
  • frontend: tags are correctly restored on the taginput (d88bae85)
  • activitypub: fix ActivityPub publishing for self-signed CA certs, closes #1503 (b8b2e895)
  • frontend: remove unauthorized mediaSize in GQL FETCH_PERSON (745b4a82)
  • frontend: temporarily emulate @update:modelValue (c237b276)
  • frontend: type='text' is not valid for a
  • frontend: post data are correctly restored when editing (66280a07)
  • frontend: don't load leaflet in the background (a70bad56)
  • frontend: update oruga-next to 0.8.10 to solve #1443 (74d56aa5)
  • frontend: padding for homepage's search form, to align it to other elements in the same page. (5998b49f)
  • frontend: navbar not updated after login (workaround) (0b3419475)
  • frontend: restore slogan and short desc in homepage (26bbe5d09)
  • frontend: restore conversation icon (ae5856823)
  • frontend: restore vite manifest (50c09318b)

For developers

  • backend: workaround test gat_actor_by_name, assertion about pictures are failing (563e7be0)
  • backend: fix ActivityPub client mock (f789fcd2)
  • frontend: fix linter error (8f2a8b43)
  • build: make linters happy (b2eb51497)
  • build: set nodejs tool version (c7db6295e)
  • dev: ease local dev (0dcd9569f)

entry.title: New release for Mobilizon: 5.1.0

This release has been made by Kaihuri

This project is funded through NGI Zero Core, a fund established by NLnet with financial support from the European Commission's Next Generation Internet program. Learn more at the NLnet project page.

Main changes

Improvements

  • 1574 - Add search button on homepage and adjust search

  • 1573 - Set a default sort for group search

  • 1572 - Display when results are loading instead of "No results found"

  • 1546 - Improve "private view" of groups

  • 1545 - Remove confusing "search in fediverse"

  • 1492 - Location enhancement - manage "radius" next to location

  • 1308 - Improve sort order of groups in search results (sort by last activity and not by creation date)

  • 1066 - Add loading wheel when "creating" or "updating" an event or group

Fixes

  • 1580 - Fix "aucun activité"

  • 1579 - Button not fully clickable

  • 1571 - Can not select start date / end date on iphone

  • 1564 - Activities shouldn't show in homepage agenda

  • 1560 - Location is lost when navigating (and not cleared in the text field...)

  • 1556 - Fix location on homepage and location clearing

  • 1525 - Menu is truncated on the right (depends on screen width)

  • 1511 - Timezone issue (user setting not applied when creating an event)

  • 1504 - Display issue on mobile when changing organizer

entry.title: New release for Mobilizon: 5.1.4
entry.content:
WARNING : this release includes fixes multiple important security issues, please upgrade as soon as possible!

Perform backups of database and files before upgrading

security fixes

  • fixes #1758 [security] BOPLA on feedToken allows account takeover ; closed by 6ecab1df1b3add630f22ada8d7790d9e578a23eb and 265803cb26dcc3bc087ba33519847e1bf21568e5
  • fixes #1759 [security] BOPLA on conversations expose private discussions ; 1ad8b268ede2964019d58d97b67064e4c9d72e10
  • fixes #1760 [security] Unauthenticated access to private images ; closed by a50681c9ac80f5d141f67e9bb81290c5545a61f5
  • fixes #1761 [security] email validation can be bypass ; closed by 1b2c55508ee7d4abb56dd2de6bc9e767d127d1e8
  • fixes #1762 [security] first profile can be created by another user ; closed by 8bb6b0b97cd6bd74975b58d9d8295ad5a257307d

breaking changes

  • It is not possible to refer to images by id. UUID must be used instead. This may break custom script. In order to recover UUD from ID, ask your admin to make an extract, filtered by your actor(s).

limitation

  • We are currently not able to use the CI to build and deploy docker container : ~~you have either to use distribution packages or build on container images on your side~~ an image built out of CI/CD has been released.
  • We are currently not able to use the CI to build ARM package : you have to build it locally
  • As per #1578, packages built for older Debian versions may not work ; you can either upgrade to debian12/bookworm or build your release locally.

Credits

A big thanks to :

  • Martin Cuddy from Radically Open Security who discovered the issues
  • Radically Open Security team for their time and help after the discovery report (Martin Cuddy, Christian Reitter)
  • NLnet which sponsored security audit
  • @massedil and @setop for the fixes
